about_the_game:
Edrick's Conquest™ is a dynamic hack’n’slash Action RPG with complex character development; epic story & endless replayability! Explore Plesmur, a high fantasy world, on your own or with your allies.

Face fantasy creatures such as the stoic orcs, ancient elementals and immortal revenants in the world of Plesmur... Or dominate your allies in multiplayer deathmatch arenas.

KEY FEATURES


Story-driven Campaign mode:
Play as King Edrick Stormwalker--an elite and experienced Flame Crusader. Defend your nation from ancient enemies!

Offline and Online Play:
Explore Plesmur, a high fantasy world, on your own or with your allies. Play with up to 7 friends on Local Area Network or Online connection.

Item Diversity:
Equip your gear according to your playstyle. There are many offensive and defensive combinations of items.

Skill Customization:
Carve your own path by choosing skills of your choice. Choose between myriads of passive and active skills then make these fit your playstyle.

Difficulty Modes:
You can choose from 3 distinct difficulty settings: Novice, Normal and Nightmare. The novice difficulty is designed for newcomers and casuals while nightmare difficulty is for hardcore players.

Quest Mode:
An endgame challenge where you explore a procedurally generated open world and face monstrous foes.

Multiplayer PvP:
Dominate your allies in competitive PvP deathmatch arenas. To make sure PvP is fair, all spells will have a special PvP version. For balancing purposes some spells will be disabled in PvP.
